text: Meheenon ka aagey peechay ker dena kufur ki ziyadti hai iss say woh log gumrahi mein dalay jatay hain jo kafir hain. Aik saal to issay halal ker letay hain aur aik saal issi ko hurmat wala ker letay hain kay Allah ney jo hurmat rakhi hai uss kay shumar mein to moafiqat ker len phir ussay halal bana len jissay Allah ney haram kiya hai enhen inn kay buray kaam bhalay dikha diye gaye hain aur qom-e-kuffaar ki Allah rehnumaee nahi farmata
